methods.description: analyze color information of the whole picture
methods.name: AnalyzeColorOfThePicture

methods.description: analyze color information of certain point (0~1, 0~1) of the picture
methods.name: AnalyzePointColorOfThePicture

methods.description: get dominate background color name from the computer vision result
methods.name: BackgroundColorNameFromCV

methods.description: Get the X location (-1000~1000) of the detected face. faceNumber starts at 0
methods.name: CenterXOfFace

methods.description: Get the Y location (-1000~1000) of the detected face. faceNumber starts at 0
methods.name: CenterYOfFace

methods.description: get a description from the computer vision result
methods.name: DescriptionFromCV

methods.description: get dominate foreground color name from the computer vision result
methods.name: ForegroundColorNameFromCV

methods.description: get blue value (0-255) of the analyzed color. 0 if picture is void
methods.name: GetBlueValue

methods.description: get green value (0-255) of the analyzed color. 0 if picture is void
methods.name: GetGreenValue

methods.description: get red value (0-255) of the analyzed color. 0 if picture is void
methods.name: GetRedValue

methods.description: Get the height (-1000~1000) of the detected face. faceNumber starts at 0
methods.name: HeightOfFace

methods.description: check whether the camera has successfully opened
methods.name: IsCameraOpen

methods.description: check whether a picture has taken
methods.name: IsPictureTaken

methods.description: Number of faces detected
methods.name: NumberOfFaces

methods.description: Open a camera and prepare to record or take a picture
methods.name: OpenCamera

methods.description: enter Bing API key for computer vision
methods.name: PrepareComputerVisionWithBingApiKey

methods.description: Start face detection and prepare to read faces data
methods.name: StartFaceDetection

methods.description: submit the taken picture for computer vision analysis
methods.name: SubmitPictureForComputerVision

methods.description: get a list of tags from computer vision result
methods.name: TagsFromCV

methods.description: take a picture and prepare to analyze colors
methods.name: TakeAPicture

methods.description: Get the width (-1000~1000) of the detected face. faceNumber starts at 0
methods.name: WidthOfFace
